meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be resected.
meanings.sent1: The doctor assessed the resectabilities of the tumor before surgery.
meanings.sent2: The hospital's success rate in resectabilities of tumors is impressive.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the title of 'most resectabilities in a single operation' was fierce.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to improve her resectabilities in the medical field was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The textbook explained the concept of resectabilities with clear examples.

meanings.sent1: The research team presented their findings on various resectabilities at the conference.
meanings.sent2: The study compared the resectabilities of different types of tumors.
meanings.sent3: The shelves in the library were filled with books on resectabilities.
meanings.sent4: His collection of medical journals showcased the diversity of resectabilities.
